title: Falling in Love in the Supernatural World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Horror   Mystery   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Acting   Cowardly Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Ghosts   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Misunderstandings   Movies   Mysterious Past   Mystery Solving   Naive Protagonist   Nightmares   Second Chance   Strong Love Interests   Thriller   Unlimited Flow   Wealthy Characters
author: Jimo Yao   即墨遥
description:
Fang Chu, a little-known star, went to a luxury cruise party and met his ex-boyfriend, with whom he had broken up with two years ago. Only then did he find out that, while he thought he was an ordinary man’s ex-boyfriend, he was a super-rich man with a mysterious identity!

If I didn’t break up, I guess I would’ve already married into a rich family by now?

I feel like I’ve missed out on a hundred million.

Just as Fang Chu was thinking about whether to get back together with him, he suddenly found himself involved in a strange homicide.

But this was only the beginning.

Fang Chu: Forget it. I just want to live a peaceful life. I don’t want this rich family.

Yu Si’ze: It’s too late.>
